channel.title: How do you make a virus?
channel.description:
ok so i have 2 computers now 1 with 2 hard drives and 2 operating systems [ubuntu] and [windows].. So i was wondering can any 1 teach me how to make a virus or hack into it??
You may be asking yourself "why does this noob want to make a virus or thinking "hes probly going to hack peopel with it." Well im not, I have always wanted to make a virus yet not for the bad resons. I have always wanted to extend my computer knowledge and well how could i put it "bragging rights" just so i can say i know how. I also will use the info to get pesky viruses off my computer. =D thanks guys
I DO NOT SUPPORT PEOPLE MAKING VIRUSES TO HARM OTHER COMPUTERS! SO PM ME YOUR AWNERS OR email pletchscape@hotmail.com (make usre no nooob hackers are givin the info they need 2 day..) -alex

item.title: How do you make a virus?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Learnt to program, if you don’t support the making of viruses then why are you contradicting yourself.

Trying to trick people here isn’t going to work, we know exactly what you’re doing. If you wanted “bragging rights” you’d make a decent piece of software.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a virus?

if;

Start! if = 1 = ON/g

    }

^
Bassiacly makes the On / Off / Visual basics…
Tis what to start with…

Languages: Batch [Shitty destroyer/not real virus…]
SmC [Suck my Cock]
Begining your virus - FOR DUMMIES

Batch insturctions…

  1. Open notepad
  2. Copy and paste this
X5O!P%@AP[4\PZX54(P^)7CC)7}$EICAR-STANDARD-ANTIVIRUS-TEST-FILE!$H+H*
  1. Save it as test.bat
    [size=1pt]Eiacr test…wont hurt computer[/size]

item.title: How do you make a virus?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

To make a virus you need to know how to write one, which involves programming. If you have to ask how to make a virus, then you don’t know enough to make one.

Read full topic
